pkgmetadata.longdescription: Systemic Risk and Network Reconstruction // Analysis of risk through liability matrices. Contains a Gibbs sampler for network reconstruction, where only row and column sums of the liabilities matrix as well as some other fixed entries are observed, following the methodology of GandyVeraart (2016) doi:10.1287/mnsc.2016.2546. It also incorporates models that use a power law distribution on the degree distribution.
